title: Living with happiness
creator_credit: Sarah Watt and Sarah Watt Productions
brief_description: A young mother finds herself gripped by an overwhelming pessimism that threatens to consume her. Only a freak accident on a lonely beach may be the key to her future happiness. Voices performed by Sigrid Thornton and William McInnes. (Awards: Winner, Emirates AFI Award for Best Animation, 2001)
